titles: A proclamation, for the better inbringing of the pole-money, imposed in anno 1695.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)
publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the third day of October, and of Our Reign the seventh year, 1695.

Imperfect: torn with some loss of text.
